settings.title: About Our Story
settings.content_1: Publish your eCommerce site quickly with our easy-to-use builder— no coding required. Migrate your items from your point of sale system or turn your Instagram feed into a shop site and start selling fast. Square Online works for all kinds of businesses—retail, restaurants, services without costly customization or add ons. Get orders to your customers in of ways by offering shipping, pickup, delivery, and even QR code ordering.
settings.content_2: Expand your reach and sell more using seamless integrations Google, Instagram, Facebook, and more. Built- in SEO tools make easy for shoppers to find your business on search engines. Get access to the entire suite of integrated Square solutions help run your business. Integration between Square Online and all Square point of sale systems makes inventory management Subscribe to Square Marketing and easily send email to your customers.
settings.service_list_1: Orders go right to your restaurant points
settings.service_list_2: Provide in-person pickup, & delivery by professional
settings.service_list_3: Offer in-person diners self serve, contactless
